title: Grim Dawn
notes: Launches a black window and game doesn't start. Workaround: force game into d3d9 mode using the following command by right-clicking Grim Dawn in Steam, select Properties, click SET LAUNCH OPTIONS and enter this (without the quotes): "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%". 1080p/60fps max settings with occasional hitches. Miniboss monsters not spawning otherwise perfectly playable.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: characters body and some components of the map weirdly flicker.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: only run with /d3d9 launch option (never tried d3d9 in Window so don't know fps in Windows), fps seems low (half) with all effect and shader to medium/low. Black screen completely without launch option

title: Grim Dawn
notes:
Game starts only with black window. Steam launch options are required (without the quotes): "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%"
At least for me it seems to also include all bosses (so e.g. quest relevant enemies appear).

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Maximum Details, 40-60fps, no workarounds, no errors.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Can't choose class. Slow performance.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Graphics is almost perfect (one time i noticed flickering in main menu) but i cannot choose class after lvling up and skills button doesn't work.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Worse performance than windows but playable. Character, NPCs and some objects flashing. Achievements reset starting a new game. Loading a savegame resets achievements and then some of them pop up (for example the ones referred to character level or notes collected but not the ones referred to a specific monster slayed)

title: Grim Dawn
notes: game runs but skills don't unlock at first level up (even at level 6 skills are still locked) and the first boss doesn't spawn so story progression is impossible

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Installs fine. Plays decent. Character graphics on main menu flicker like crazy until after starting a game. Some screen tearing. Can't assign Devotion points. When experience bar fills you don't get a new level it just resets the bar back to zero for that character level. Grand Viziers won't appear in Queen's Hive.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: For whatever reason cant change masteries and none of the bosses spawn.  Performance wise.....flawless....getting about 130-150 fps everything on high to ultra
protonVersion: Tried both 3.7-3 and 3.7-5.  Same issues were on both

title: Grim Dawn
notes: Server browser crashes the game, minibosses don't spawn, main menu flickers and it leaves groups instantly when joined even with autoparty.

title: Grim Dawn
notes: dx11 (default without /d3d9 flag) worked great. I can't choose a new class on a new character, and some bosses don't spawn. These aren't problems that exist on regular wine, or wine-staging. Shaman, inquisitor, and necromancer don't show up at all, if you can open the skill window on Proton.
No class selection, no devotion allocation possibly, no boss spawn = game progress is not possible
